dt: {bc}suggestive of an uncle especially in kindliness or geniality

dt.t: Jovial and {wi}avuncular{/wi}, the President's chief of staff seems oblivious to the pressures that accompany what is arguably the second most powerful job in the land.
Two weeks of poker had led to his writing to his uncle a distressed, but confident, request for more funds; and the {wi}avuncular{/wi} foot had come down with a joyous bang.

shortdef: suggestive of an uncle especially in kindliness or geniality
of or relating to an uncle
